meanings.definition: To produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper.
meanings.sent1: She draws a big sun in the corner of her drawing.
meanings.sent2: He draws a beautiful landscape with mountains and a river.
meanings.sent3: The little girl draws a funny face with big, round eyes.
meanings.sent4: His art draws a vivid picture of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The artist draws with such skill that it looks almost real.

meanings.definition: To pull or drag something in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: He draws the heavy box across the room.
meanings.sent2: She draws the curtains to let in more light.
meanings.sent3: The magnet draws the metal paperclips towards it.
meanings.sent4: The strong wind draws the leaves off the trees.
meanings.sent5: The tractor draws the plow through the field with ease.

meanings.definition: To attract or pull towards oneself.
meanings.sent1: The sweet smell of cookies draws her into the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: His charisma draws people to him wherever he goes.
meanings.sent3: The colorful display draws the attention of passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter draws everyone closer to her.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign draws customers into the store.

meanings.definition: To select randomly or by chance.
meanings.sent1: She draws a card from the deck and reveals the queen of hearts.
meanings.sent2: He draws a number from the hat during the raffle.
meanings.sent3: The lottery machine draws the winning numbers every week.
meanings.sent4: The teacher draws names to pick the student who will present first.
meanings.sent5: The game show host draws a lucky winner from the audience.

meanings.definition: To finish a competition with an equal score.
meanings.sent1: The chess match draws after both players run out of moves.
meanings.sent2: The soccer game draws with a score of 2-2.
meanings.sent3: The quiz competition draws as both teams answer all questions correctly.
meanings.sent4: The tennis tournament draws as the final set reaches a tiebreaker.
meanings.sent5: The basketball game draws in the last few seconds with a tied score.
